text: Pedernera is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Adolfo Pedernera (1918–1995), Argentine footballer *Juan Esteban Pedernera (1796–1886), Argentine general and interim President of Argentina == See also == *General Pedernera Department, is a department of San Luis Province, Argentina *Gimnasia y Esgrima y Pedernera Unidos, is a sports club from San Luis, Argentina
title: Pedernera
